content: Backup can be saved to your third-party account (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive or Google Drive). You need to connect your third-party account (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive or Google Drive) before you will be able to save your backup there.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe third-party backup storage options. It informs users that they need to connect their third-party account to save backups there. This message appears in the UI on certain pages of the auto-backup and manual-backup processes, particularly when selecting a third-party storage type.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistent spacing around 'dot' in 'Box.com'. The rest of the platform names use spaces. It should be Box.com.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Box.com

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistent spacing around 'dot' in 'Google Drive'. The rest of the platform names use spaces. It should be Google Drive.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Google Drive

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'before you will be able to save your backup there' is somewhat awkwardly translated as 'buna görə də, ehtiyat nüsxələrinizi yadda saxlaya bilmək üçün əvvəlcə...'. A more natural phrasing would be something like '...yadda saxlaya bilməsinizdən əvvəl'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Buna görə də, ehtiyat nüsxələrinizi yadda saxlaya bilməsinizdən əvvəl öz üçüncü tərəf hesabınızı (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive və ya Google Drive) ilə əlaqələndirməlisiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation of "Google Drive" is missing the word "Disk". It should be "Disk Google" instead of just "Disk Google".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'Disk Google' to 'Disk Google'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of "účet třetí strany (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive nebo Disk Google)" is awkward in Czech. It's better to rephrase to avoid the exact repetition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rewriting the second instance to something like: 'Předtím, než tam budete moci zálohu uložit, je nutné propojit svůj účet (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive nebo Disk Google).'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ThirdPartyResourceDescription" suggests a more descriptive explanation is needed. While technically correct, it lacks context for a user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like: "Ihre Sicherung kann in einem Konto eines Drittanbieters (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive oder Google Drive) gespeichert werden.  Sie müssen zuerst Ihr Konto bei einem dieser Anbieter verbinden, bevor Sie die Sicherung dort speichern können."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'Ihr Konto (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive oder Google Drive)' is a bit clunky. It's better to avoid unnecessary repetition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace the second instance with 'einen dieser Anbieter'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of the list of third-party services (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive, Google Drive) feels slightly clunky in Japanese. While technically correct, it could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to avoid repetition. For example: 'バックアップは、Dropbox、Box.com、OneDrive、Google Driveなどのサードパーティーアカウントに保存できます。バックアップを保存する前、これらのサードパーティーアカウントに接続する必要があります。' (Backup can be saved to a third-party account such as Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive, or Google Drive. You need to connect to these third-party accounts before saving your backup.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation consistently uses 'DropBox' instead of 'Dropbox'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace all instances of 'DropBox' with 'Dropbox'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation repeats the list of third-party services.  It's more common to include it once.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the second instance of '(Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive, Google Drive)' to avoid repetition.  Consider rephrasing the second sentence to avoid stating the account list again.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation has a space before 'ການ' in 'ການ ສໍາຮອງຂໍ້ມູນ'. This creates an awkward separation of words.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການສໍາຮອງຂໍ້ມູນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation uses 'Back-ups' instead of 'Backups'. Consistency with the English 'Backup' would be preferable, although 'Back-ups' is not technically incorrect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Backups' for consistency with the original English.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'serviço de terceiros' (third-party service) is a bit clunky in Portuguese. While technically correct, it's not the most natural wording.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'conta externa' (external account) or 'conta em outro serviço' (account in another service).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'antes que possa guardar' is grammatically correct, but 'antes de poder guardar' is more common and flows better in Portuguese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'antes que possa guardar' to 'antes de poder guardar'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'මෙයට සම්බන්ධ කළ යුතුය' (should be connected to this) is a bit awkward in this context. It implies the backup location itself needs to be connected, rather than the user's account.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙයට සම්බන්ධ කළ යුතුයි

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'තෙවන පාර්ශ්ව ගිණුම' (third-party account) feels clunky.  While acceptable, it could be slightly improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ තෙවන පාර්ශ්ව ගිණුම (or ඊළඟ) (your third-party account or next)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Disk Google” is a less common term in Slovak. The correct and more natural translation for Google Drive is "Google Disk" or, even better, just using the English term "Google Drive".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "Disk Google" with "Google Drive".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of "účet tretej strany (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive alebo Disk Google)" makes the sentence slightly clunky. While not incorrect, a slight rephrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the second instance to something like: "...predtým, ako budete môcť tam uložiť zálohu."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'zunanjem ponudniku (Dropbox, box.com, OneDrive ali Google Drive)' is a bit clunky. While accurate, it could be slightly improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Varnostno kopijo lahko shranite s svojim računom pri enem od ponudnikov (Dropbox, box.com, OneDrive ali Google Drive). Račun pri enem od ponudnikov (Dropbox, box.com, OneDrive ali Google Drive) morate predhodno povezati. Tam boste lahko shranili svojo varnostno kopijo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of the list of third-party services (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive or Google Drive) is somewhat clunky. While accurate, it could be slightly improved for readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to avoid repetition, e.g., 'Backup can be saved to your third-party account (such as Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive or Google Drive).'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of the list of third-party services (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive or Google Drive) in both sentences makes the text slightly redundant and less fluent. While not incorrect, it can be improved for readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to avoid repetition. For example: 'Backup can be saved to your third-party account, such as Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive, or Google Drive. You need to connect your third-party account before you can save your backup there.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistency in capitalization of 'Google Диск' - should be 'Google Disk' to match English version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'Google Диск' to 'Google Disk'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "在使用此功能之前" (Before using this function) is a bit clunky and doesn't perfectly capture the original meaning of "before you will be able to save your backup there." It implies a general function, not specifically the backup saving functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 备份到这些位置之前 (Backup to these locations before)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "以便完成存储" (in order to complete storage) is overly formal and doesn't flow naturally. It's not the best way to translate "so you can save your backup there".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 这样才能保存您的备份 (So you can save your backup)
